titleStmt.title: The last legacy of Henry Care, Gent. lately deceased containing a brief sum of Christian doctrine, by way of question and answer : particularly relating to several of the most important points controverted between us, and the Romanists : decided by express testimonies of the Holy Scripture, and evident reason : published for the use of such as are unable to purchase, or comprehend larger and more elaborate tracts.
titleStmt.author: Care, Henry, 1646-1688.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
